messages.ajaxError: An error occured while adding the property to favorites.
messages.footer.newsletter.text: Get prime access to our exclusive properties by subscribing to our daily newsletter:
messages.errorPage.message: This page does not exist or cannot be found.
messages.homePage.description: Discover our collection of exceptional properties
messages.homePage.intro.mainTitle: Find your next luxurious home with
messages.homePage.intro.firstP: We offer you a personalized and confidential service to help you find the residence of your dreams.
messages.homePage.intro.secondP: Our selection features properties that combine refinement, elegance, prime locations, and discretion.
messages.homePage.services.description: Ensuring your access to homeownership with the highest standards
messages.homePage.services.firstdescription: We support you in the architectural design and layout of your residence according to your wishes. From the initial plans to the finishing touches, our network of architects and interior designers ensures that your lifestyle is reflected in every detail.
messages.homePage.services.seconddescription: Benefit from tailored legal support, designed to meet your personal or professional needs. Our experts provide guidance and advice to secure your procedures and protect your interests.
messages.homePage.services.thirddescription: Entrust us with the complete management of your rental properties. From finding reliable tenants to handling administrative tasks, we optimize your returns while ensuring peace of mind.
messages.homePage.services.fourthdescription: Enjoy an exclusive service for your car: maintenance, delivery, availability, and administrative procedures. We take care of your vehicle as if it were our own.
messages.propertyFilter.descriptionOne: Our agency prides itself on offering a rich catalog of exceptional properties: apartments, houses, villas, estates... no doubt you’ll find your dream property among our selection.
messages.propertyFilter.descriptionTwo: We also have an off-market catalog: contact us directly to learn more.
messages.about.sample: Born 20 years ago from a passion for exceptional properties, our agency set itself the mission of finding the most incredible estates and offering them exclusively to our privileged clientele.
messages.about.descriptionOne: Novalya was born from a simple conviction: prestige real estate deserves a new vision – more human, more aesthetic, more aligned with today’s art of living.
messages.about.descriptionTwo: We select exceptional, rare, and inspiring properties for a clientele seeking more than just a space: an emotion, a place of connection, a harmony.
messages.about.descriptionThree: Independent, demanding, and future-oriented, Novalya embodies a new generation of agencies: digital, elegant, discreet.
messages.about.descriptionFour: To transform every search into an experience, every property into an obvious choice.
messages.about.jobsDescription: Discover our agency and the agents who have built its reputation.
messages.contactPage.description: Your dream home awaits you. Get in touch with us today and let our team of real estate experts guide you towards your next property.
messages.contactPage.contactMessage: To schedule an appointment or for any questions regarding a property, please fill out the form below and let us know your availability:
messages.contactPage.flashSuccess: Your message has been sent successfully!

messages.userIndex.deleteMessage: The user has been successfully deleted!
messages.account.deleteMessage: By requesting the deletion of your account, it will be deactivated and permanently deleted after 30 days. If you sign in again before this period, your account will be reactivated.
messages.account.flashSuccess.info: Your information have been updated successfully!
messages.account.flashSuccess.delete: Your account has been successfully deactivated, and it will be deleted in 30 days unless you sign in again before then.
messages.account.flashSuccess.reactivate: Your account has been successfully reactivated!
messages.login.description: Log into your personnal account to see and manage your favorite properties.
messages.login.alreadyLogged: You are already logged in as
messages.login.flashSuccessLogout: You have been successfully logged out.
messages.register.text: Create your personal account to see and manage your favorite properties.
